sources.title: The Mysterious Retort
sources.description: The original French title of the colored and shortened print is Alchimiste Parafaragaramus ou la cornue infernale . IMDb Page

sources.title: The Mysterious Retort
sources.description: The original French title is L'alchimiste Parafaragaramus ou la cornue infernale . IMDb Page A color fragment of this can be found here .

metadata.Plot: In his well-equipped private laboratory, a mystic silver-haired alchemist exhausted from the endless attempts to create his magnum opus falls asleep in a deep and comfortable armchair next to a high-pressure retort. Sound asleep, the weary sorcerer won't even notice the strange manifestations emerging from the vessel's bottom, when all of a sudden, things start spiralling out of control. Is this a vivid dream, or a cornucopia of secreted desires?
